    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    BoundValue<T>
    BoundValues are added to rendered SQL as a parameter marker only.
    class 
    Constant<T>
     
    class 
    DerivedColumn<T>
    A derived column is a column that is not directly related to a table.
    class 
    SqlColumn<T>
    This class represents the definition of a column in a table.
    class 
    StringConstant
